content:
Is there a way to cross-reference in Lean comments like we do in LaTeX?

Sometimes I want to refer to a theorem, but there is a danger that I'll change the name of the theorem without remembering that the old name was mentioned in a comment somewhere.
#mwe:

/-- This is a consequence of \ref{mythm} but we give a direct proof. -/

where an error would pop up if there is no theorem called mythm.
mythm should cross-ref, but will not error
I think Verso is rumoured to provide this
`mythm` is the closest we have today in the doc-gen docs.
One could almost use recall for this it seems.
